explains: n. （Lark）人名；（东南亚国家华语）六
wordGroup: for a lark 当作玩笑；为了取乐
rise with the lark 早起

sentences.en: She was called the Lark in the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 她在附近被称为百灵鸟。

sentences.en: Cosette, the lark, as she is called hereabouts!
sentences.cn: 云雀珂赛特，在这一带这么叫她！

sentences.en: Could I exchange my nature with any other creature, I fain would be such a happy little lark!
sentences.cn: 如果我变成其他动物，我愿意做一只快乐的小云雀！
